channel.title: How to change the place where th cahce is
channel.description: i wanan set the cache on my usb so i changed the file where the cache is in the signlink to e: sam place etc and i setted the cache there compiled etc but it still gives the signlink eror can some1 help me so i can run it properly from my usb stick

item.title: How to change the place where th cahce is
item.dc:creator: @nobiwa666 nobiwa666
item.description:
@nobiwa666 wrote:

signlink:233 signlink:372 applet_sub:388 client:2196 java.lang.runtime exeption

thats the error

normal this is the signlink

String[] cacheDirs = { "c:\508cache\rs2" };

and i changed it to this

String[] cacheDirs = { "E:\508cache\rs2" };

and the cache is there

but it gives this error

signlink:233 signlink:372 applet_sub:388 client:2196 java.lang.runtime exeption

Read full topic
